title: Azaad Pakistan
description:
Azaad Pakistan - is a series of short documentaries / documentary series which will highlight some very serious and ignored Ã¢â‚¬Å“crystal clearÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ facts that will try to answer the most common questions asked by the youth of "Islamic Republic Of Pakistan". Azaad Pakistan talks more about the mistakes that we made as a nation and how every individual has played his part in the cultivation of the mistakes to a national level.

How well we are told that we are a free nation and how badly, by our own hands, we are not. How melodiously we are hallucinated. 

Pakistan, now known to the world as the epicenter for terror, a terror exporting country, a police state
and a "Failed State".

Azaad Pakistan invites it's so called "failed Nation" to come and see what this Nation has been capable of, what kind of heart this Country holds and what kind of destiny awaits awakening of it's scattered Shaheens.






Note:
- Video contains some very important footages, interviews and lectures of some of the known scholars, historians and political analysts of the region

- All the religious, historical and political facts and informations, in the series, have been extracted after almost an year of study and research. They are lined up after being crosschecked by various authentic resources.
